item.title: Charter Sheds 80,000 TV Customers in Latest Quarter, Shrinking Losses
item.description: The cable and Internet giant, having just unveiled a merger deal with Cox Communications, also lost 117,000 Internet customers and added 500,000 mobile line subscribers, which sent its share price tum
